user.title: BG Smart Local Control
user.description:
Connect to your BG Smart dimmer on the local network.

The PoP (Proof of Possession) key is shown as 'Device ID' in the BG Smart app under device settings, or printed on the device label.

data_description.host: IP address of your BG Smart dimmer (e.g., 192.168.1.100)
data_description.pop: Find in BG Smart app → Device Settings → Device ID

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to device. Check IP address, port, and PoP key.
